name: CIELO

description.short: Ballgown with leaf embroidery and versatile multi-way silhouette.
description.full:
Pricing & Availability

  • For Sale: ₱15,500
  • Open for Rental (Shop display)
  • Made to Rent available

Details

  • Style: Ballgown
  • Fabric: Premium Textured Tulle & Intricate Leaf Embroidery
  • Design: Versatile Multi-way silhouette
  • Size: Small to Medium (Onhand)

Features

  • Plunging V-neckline with a sheer modesty insert for a modern, romantic touch.
  • Exquisite leaf and floral lace appliqués cascading beautifully from the bodice to the skirt.
  • Full, voluminous tulle skirt that holds its shape beautifully even without a petticoat.
  • Detachable tulle shoulder ribbons for an ethereal, customizable look.
  • Adjustable back to ensure a snug and flattering fit.

priceMessage: Message us on Facebook for the rental price or to schedule a fitting!
